00033 #include "intern/GHOST_Debug.h"
00034 #include "GHOST_Types.h"
00035 #include "GHOST_Path-api.h"
00036 #include "GHOST_ISystemPaths.h"
00037 
00038 GHOST_TSuccess GHOST_CreateSystemPaths(void)
00039 {
00040     return GHOST_ISystemPaths::create();
00041 }
00042 
00043 GHOST_TSuccess GHOST_DisposeSystemPaths(void)
00044 {
00045     return GHOST_ISystemPaths::dispose();
00046 }
00047 
00048 const GHOST_TUns8* GHOST_getSystemDir()
00049 {
00050     GHOST_ISystemPaths* systemPaths = GHOST_ISystemPaths::get();
00051     return systemPaths ? systemPaths->getSystemDir() : 0;
00052 }
00053 
00054 const GHOST_TUns8* GHOST_getUserDir()
00055 {
00056     GHOST_ISystemPaths* systemPaths = GHOST_ISystemPaths::get();
00057     return systemPaths ? systemPaths->getUserDir() : 0; /* shouldn't be NULL */
00058 }
00059 
00060 const GHOST_TUns8* GHOST_getBinaryDir()
00061 {
00062     GHOST_ISystemPaths* systemPaths = GHOST_ISystemPaths::get();
00063     return systemPaths ? systemPaths->getBinaryDir() : 0;  /* shouldn't be NULL */
00064 }
00065 
00066 void GHOST_addToSystemRecentFiles(const char* filename)
00067 {
00068     GHOST_ISystemPaths* systemPaths = GHOST_ISystemPaths::get();
00069     if (systemPaths) {
00070         systemPaths->addToSystemRecentFiles(filename);
00071     }
00072 }
